de.mrapp.android.validation.adapter

Class ProxySpinnerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.validation.adapter.ProxySpinnerAdapter

  • public class ProxySpinnerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    A spinner adapter, which acts as a proxy for an other adapter in order to initially show a hint instead of the adapter's first item.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxySpinnerAdapter(Context context, SpinnerAdapter adapter, int hintViewId, java.lang.CharSequence hint, ColorStateList hintColor)
      Creates a new spinner adapter, which acts as a proxy for an other adapter in order to initially show a hint instead of the adapter's first item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProxySpinnerAdapter

        public ProxySpinnerAdapter(Context context,
                           SpinnerAdapter adapter,
                           int hintViewId,
                           java.lang.CharSequence hint,
                           ColorStateList hintColor)
        Creates a new spinner adapter, which acts as a proxy for an other adapter in order to initially show a hint instead of the adapter's first item.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the adapter, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        adapter - The adapter, which contains the actual items, as an instance of the type SpinnerAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        hintViewId - The resource id of the layout, which should be used to display the hint, as an Integer value. The resource id must corresponds to a valid layout resource
        hint - The hint, which should be displayed initially, as an instance of the type CharSequence or null, if no hint should be displayed
        hintColor - The color of the hint, which should be displayed initially, as an instance of the class ColorStateList or null, if the default color should be used
